archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Define Loyalty Program Key Performance Indicator
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Define a key quality/performance indicator that will be used when evaluating a loyalty program.

properties.value: Define Loyalty Program Key Performance Indicator defines a key quality/performance indicator (KQI/KQI) that will be used when evaluating a loyalty program. KQIs/KPIs may be used to measure financials, such as cost per participant and program break even point, participant acceptance, market penetration. Note that this process uses a generalized set of metric processes to define the KPIs, thresholds, and consequences, both positive and negative, associated with thresholds.
